entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY ENDED, Morden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:28 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.5°C

entry.title: Friday: Blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Blowing snow this morning. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023
